events.name: Robots for F&B and Hospitality
events.description:
How will robots reshape the food and hospitality industry? From robot waiters at Rong Heng Seafood restaurant to bartending robots by robotics startup SousChef, we discuss how robots are built and deployed to interact with humans in a food setting. 


 Tushar Mohan, CEO of SousChef Tushar Mohan is the co-founder and CEO of Soushcef, a Robotics & Automation startup focusing in the F&B industry. He holds a Bachelors in Engineering Product Development (EPD) and a Diploma in Electronics (major in Robotics).Â  During his time in SUTD, Tushar was involved in various Robotics research projects such asÂ Bio-inspired Robotic Fish, Re-configurable robots etc. and has presented his work in various international conferences in Paris, Newfoundland and San Francisco. He has also worked with JVC-Kenwood, Airbus Innovation, P&G and few other local startups to build innovative automation solutions for their R&D facility.Â  The entrepreneurship bug bit him when he was in his Junior year of SUTD. Prior to Souschef, he co-founded an ed-tech startup which focused on providing workshops to students in Developing Countries. After running it for one year, he decided to shut down as the business model wasnâ€™t scalable. Fast-forward two years, after pivoting 4 times, making a lot of mistakes, lots of learning, Souschef is now invested by Entrepreneur First SG and have a growing customer base in the South East Asia Pacific.Â
events.location: NUS Enterprise@Blk71, 71 Ayer Rajah Crescent, #02-01, Singapore 139951

events.name: DataJam!
events.description: We're looking to increase our contributions to the social sector here in Singapore, and will be having a monthly meeting for volunteers who want to do more. These will be working sessions which can include:Â  â€¢Â DataJams where data is cleaned and prepped for further analysis,Â  â€¢Â Clinics for social sector organisations to drop in and ask data-related questions, and â€¢ Planning sessions for wider community events.Â  This is a closed, by-invitation only session for volunteers whom we've worked with before. If we've forgotten you (sorry!) or you're new and have a burning desire to join these sessions, please send us a message! For others who can't make it regularly, these sessions are helping us have more community-wide events. Please understand that no food will be provided, so do make preparations to grab a bite before you turn up. Also, it would be great if youÂ bring your own water bottle along too. More details to come! Agenda 6.45 - 7pm: Registration7 - 7.30pm: Data review and task assignment7.30 - 9.30pm: Data cleaning
events.location: Tableau Singapore, South Beach Tower Level 10, 38 Beach Road
